hostname.title: TPM VM IP or FQDN
hostname.description: TPM VM hostname or IP address

mgmt_ip_prefix.title: Management Network Prefix Length
mgmt_ip_prefix.description: Management network prefix length for TPM VM

mgmt_gateway.title: Management Network Gateway
mgmt_gateway.description: Management network gateway for TPM VM

mgmt_bridge.title: Management Network Bridge
mgmt_bridge.description: Network Bridge used for the management interface of TPM. It is a Linux network bridge. This field can be overridden by defining the management network bridge separately in the component configuration. Defaults to the global setting

vmname.title: VM name
vmname.description: Name of the Virtual Machine on the Hypervisor

target_server_type.title: Target Server Type
target_server_type.description: Type of hypervisor environment into which the instance will be created

target_server.title: Target Server IP or FQDN
target_server.description: Hostname or IP address of the hypervisor where VM will be instantiated

cpuset.title: KVM cpuset information
cpuset.description: Cpuset information for cpu pinning on KVM. For example, TPM requires 2 cores and sample values will be of the form [1, 2]

preserve_vm.title: Preserve TPM VM
preserve_vm.description: Shuts down the vm during destroy process, instead of actually deleting them.
